CustomField.description: Field for display purposes (external users/ROOFPRO Contractors) so currency code would not be visible after enabling Multi-Currency.
CustomField.formula: "$" & IF( Loan_Amount__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Loan_Amount__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Loan_Amount__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Loan_Amount__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Loan_Amount__c )), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Loan_Amount__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Loan_Amount__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Loan_Amount__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) )
CustomField.label: Loan Amount
